title: Mandalay Resources announces cash balance for Q3 2024
excerpt: Mandalay Resources reports quarter-end cash balance of $55M and 20,323 ounces of consolidated gold equivalent production.
text: To ensure this doesn’t happen in the future, please enable Javascript and cookies in your browser.Is this happening to you frequently? Please report it on our feedback forum.If you have an ad-blocker enabled you may be blocked from proceeding. Please disable your ad-blocker and refresh.
html:
To ensure this doesn’t happen in the future, please enable Javascript and cookies in your browser.

Is this happening to you frequently? Please report it on our feedback forum.

If you have an ad-blocker enabled you may be blocked from proceeding. Please disable your ad-blocker and refresh.
